title: The secret that fuels Metallica? Earl Grey tea
description: Drummer Lars Ulrich on his tea-drinking habit, buying a vinyl factory and Metallica's new album.

title: Vitaly Votanovsky flees Russia after documenting a Wagner cemetery
description: How an activist documented Russia's war dead by counting graves - and was forced to flee.

title: From Ghana to Germany: Tracking down the owner of a lost wallet

title: 'We won't apologise for being an all-female clergy'
description: Leicester Cathedral is believed to have England's first fully-female clergy team at the helm.

title: Match of the Day: How Erling Haaland & Kevin de Bruyne fired 'breathtaking' Man City to Southampton win
description: Match of the Day's Gary Lineker, Alan Shearer and Danny Murphy discuss Erling Haaland and Kevin de Bruyne's influence in Manchester City's 4-1 victory over Southampton.

title: 'Outrageous' - Haaland's 'amazing' goal sees more records tumble
description: Erling Haaland's "exceptional" bicycle kick in Manchester City's 4-1 win at Southampton takes him to a record 30 goals in the Premier League this season.

title: Dozens killed in 'barbaric' Burkina Faso attacks
description: Nobody has claimed responsibility for the attacks that left 44 dead, but jihadist violence in the northern Sahel is common.

title: Tunisia migrant boat shipwrecks leave 27 dead or missing

title: Giant sketch in field marks Picasso death anniversary

title: British-Israeli sisters killed in West Bank named

title: Masters 2023: Rains stops third round at Augusta as Brooks Koepka leads

description: Watch some of Son Heung-min's best Tottenham goals as the South Korea forward becomes the first Asian player to score 100 Premier League goals.

title: Southampton 1-4 Manchester City: Erling Haaland scores sublime bicycle kick in comfortable win
description: Erling Haaland scores a superb bicycle kick as Manchester City reduce the gap to Premier League leaders Arsenal to five points with a comfortable victory at relegation-threatened Southampton.

description: Son Heung-min is one of Asian football's first global superstars and now the continent's first player to hit 100 goals in the Premier League.
